com.varausjarjestelma.kontrolleri

Class Kontrolleri

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.varausjarjestelma.kontrolleri.Kontrolleri

  • public class Kontrolleri
extends Object
    The controller class. Serves as an intermediary between the UI and the database. This class is a singleton, so there is only one instance of it over the program's runtime.
    Author:
    V. Ahlstén, E. Niemi, S. Sarviala

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean asetaVaraus(int käyttäjänID, int tilaID, Timestamp alku, Timestamp loppu)
      Forms a reservation (Varaukset) out of the arguments and inserts it into the database.
      Käyttäjä etsiKäyttäjä(int id)
      Returns the user matching the id passed as an argument.
      Tila etsiTila(int id)
      Returns a room (Tila) matching the id passed as an argument.
      TilanOminaisuus[] etsiTilanOminaisuudet(Ominaisuus ominaisuus)
      Returns an array of connectors (TilanOminaisuus) between a room (Tila) and an attribute (Ominaisuus) relating to the attribute passed as an argument.
      TilanOminaisuus[] etsiTilanOminaisuudet(Tila tila)
      Returns an array of connectors (TilanOminaisuus) between a room (Tila) and an attribute (Ominaisuus) relating to the room passed as an argument.

      Returns the reservation (Varaukset) matching the id passed as an argument.
      static Kontrolleri haeInstanssi()
      Provides an instance of Kontrolleri.

      Returns an array containing all the reservations (Varaukset) in the database.

      Provides an array filled with all the users in the database.

      Provides an array filled with all the room attributes in the database.

      Provides an array filled with all the rooms in the database.

      Tells how many rooms there are in the database.

      Returns an array of reservations (Varaukset) relating to the user (Käyttäjä) passed as an argument.

      Returns an array of reservations (Varaukset) relating to the room (Tila) passed as an argument.
